data.name: WIC Pater Expedition
data.desc: WIC send Adriaen Janszoon Pater against Sp
data.locn: Netherlands, Azores, Cape Verde Islands, Pernambuco, Grenada, Cape San Antonio, Barbados, St. Kitts, Mona Passage, Trinidad, Bonaire, Santa Marta
data.agents_nsp0: Adriaen Janszoon Pater, Vc-Adm Marten Thijsz 11 Ships 842 sailors 326 soldiers, Jan Janszoon van Hoorn 13 Ships
data.prim_n: WIC 1.05.01.01, 2 [1 Aug, 23 Sep, 8, 12 Nov, 2 Dec 1629] / WIC 1.05.01.01, 5752 [13 Jun 1630] / WIC 1.05.01.01, 20 / Laet [missg] = Laet/Naber 2 83-[missg], 178-182 / Wassenaer 15 90 / Wassenaer 16 [missg] / Duro 4 111 / Wright D 1 p *114
